data: NEPH Hemodialysis Acute Kidney Injury Initiation Treatment (Day of Treatment)

Consults/Referrals
Dietitian Adult Consult
Routine, Reason for Consult: Other (Specify in Special Instructions), New HD patient consult - BCM at baseline as needed
Communication Orders
Conditional Order - Ongoing
If/when urine output reported greater than 400mL (approx. 2 cups) per day, then give collection hat to patient
Communication Order
Nurse to notify provider regarding patient reported urine output
Conditional Order - Ongoing
If/when intradialytic weight gain greater than 1.5kg per HD session, then notify nephrologist to consider initiation or up titration, if not already on furosemide
Complete all lab orders in weekly phase before proceeding to q2week phase
